quote.quote: They said the pointed ears could be fixed, but I have to say, they make a great conversation starter.
quote.author: Ika Melning, Former Raid Leader

contents: Knowing and revealing what your character looks like is important for representing a core aspect of their characterization and will help your GM and players in interacting with them in the world of Waygate. It may also impact how NPCs in the world of Waygate act towards you.
